experience_guidance.rule: Avoid MOVE RIGHT/UP or forward advances for FIGHTER, Aircraft, Decoy if friendly_support_overlap=False, especially at x>=10.
experience_guidance.rationale: Isolated advances expose units to enemy engagement without protection; seen in 70% of reflections.

experience_guidance.rule: Avoid SHOOT for FIGHTER/Aircraft if friendly_support_overlap=False and enemy_radar_overlap=True.
experience_guidance.rationale: Solo shooting draws counterfire without suppression; recurrent in exposed positions.

experience_guidance.rule: Avoid formation divergence (orthogonal MOVE directions from allies) without shared target or support.
experience_guidance.rationale: Breaks mutual support, leading to isolated overextension; multiple fighter/decoy cases.

experience_guidance.rule: Avoid SHOOT for SAM unless visible_enemies confirmed and friendly_support_overlap=True.
experience_guidance.rationale: Premature firing reveals fixed position without cover; firing discipline violation.
